add(int) - Method in class hotel.structures.Date

addNewReservation(Reservation, Date) - Method in class hotel.structures.Room
addNewReservation(Reservation, Date) tries to add a reservation to the LinkedList and returns how much space will there be between the new reservation and the pre-existing reservations for a BestsFit algorithm on another class.
